py_sim.vectorfield.vectorfields module¶

vectorfields.py defines various vector fields and associated parameters

class py_sim.vectorfield.vectorfields.AvoidObstacle(x_o: TwoDimArray, v_max: float, S: float = 5.0, R: float = 1.0)¶

Bases: object

Defines an avoid obstacle vector field with a finite sphere of influence

x_o¶

Position of the obstacle to avoid

Type:

TwoDimArray

v_max¶

Maximum velocity of the vector field

Type:

float

S¶

Sphere of influence

Type:

float

R¶

Radius of max effect

Type:

float

calculate_vector(state: UnicyleStateProtocol, time: float = 0.0) → TwoDimArray¶

Calculates a vector from the state to the goal, the vector is scaled to respect max velocity

Parameters:

  • state – State of the vehicle

  • time – Time of the state

Returns:

Vector pointing towards the goal

Return type:

TwoDimArray

class py_sim.vectorfield.vectorfields.GoToGoalField(x_g: TwoDimArray, v_max: float, sig: float = 1.0)¶

Bases: object

Defines a go-to-goal vector field

x_g¶

2D goal position that vector field attempts to reach

Type:

TwoDimArray

v_max¶

Maximum translational velocity

Type:

float

sig_sq¶

Convergence factor for going to zero velocity, squared

Type:

float

calculate_vector(state: UnicyleStateProtocol, time: float = 0.0) → TwoDimArray¶

Calculates a vector from the state to the goal, the vector is scaled to respect max velocity

Parameters:

  • state – State of the vehicle

  • time – Time of the state

Returns:

Vector pointing towards the goal

Return type:

TwoDimArray

class py_sim.vectorfield.vectorfields.SummedField(fields: list[py_sim.tools.sim_types.VectorField], weights: list[float], v_max: float)¶

Bases: object

Defines a vector field that is the summation of passed in fields

fields¶

List of individual vector fields to be summed together

Type:

list[VectorField]

weights¶

Weight associated with each vector field

Type:

list[float]

v_max¶

maximum allowable velocity

Type:

float

calculate_vector(state: UnicyleStateProtocol, time: float = 0.0) → TwoDimArray¶

Calculates a summed vector and thresholds it to v_max

Parameters:

  • state – State of the vehicle

  • time – Time of the state

Returns:

Resulting summed vector

Return type:

TwoDimArray
